2011 Turin: Fiat SpA Chief Executive Officer Sergio Marchionne confirmed the Italian carmaker's pledge to spend â¬ 20 billion( Dh100.8 billion) revamping its domestic plants after meeting with Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi . Fiat is a multinational which is expanding internationally, but will keep an Italian heart, Industry Minister Paolo Romani said yesterday after discussing the investment plan with the CEO and Chairman John Elkann .
